rules_text:
When this artifact enters, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of basic lands you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text:
